sentences.en: A bicameral legislature has two houses.
sentences.cn: 两院制的立法机构由两院组成.

sentences.en: On legislative system for a bicameral legislature, both Chambers of the elected directly by the voters in a house of representatives of the senate and state elected;
sentences.cn: 在立法体制上实行两院制，两院由一个选民直接选举产生的众议院和各州选举产生的参议院组成；

sentences.en: The Legislative branch, a bicameral legislature called Congress, consists of of Representatives and the Senate.
sentences.cn: 立法分支是被称为国会的两院立法机构, 由众议院和参议院组成.

trans.tran_en: a bicameral  legislature (=  part of the government that makes laws  )  consists of two parts, such as the Senate and the House of Representatives in the US Congress
